tha-ap161:0.3_0: and came forth with senior monks.
tha-ap161:1.3_0: seeing the flowers of the clouds,
tha-ap161:1.4_0: I recollected the Buddha of the Buddha.
tha-ap161:2.3_0: Moreover, they have fallen into a monument;
tha-ap161:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap161:4.2_0: I alone became a dark disciple.
tha-ap161:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap161:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pajjota.
tha-ap161:7.1_0: The ninth flowers of the seniors.
